resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · Change: Added closeout message for systems running on Android < 5.0
 · New: Show info on completion of "add current location"
 · New: Add option to clear the goto history
 · New: Support other OSM based online map sources
 · New: Add support for multilingual OSM maps
 · New: Implemented Filtering by Country
 · New: Copy waypoints between caches
 · New: Sort "goto history" waypoints by newest on top
 · New: Add waypoint from single cache map added for Google Maps
 · Fix: Crash on moving data to SD card
